p: We note that the rate of varroa infection estimated after treatment with the essential oil of sage is 6930 individuals living at the expense of 66,250 bees ( Table 2). This number is the equivalent of an infestation rate of 10.46%, judged to be above the tolerance threshold established by Colin [ 8], which is 5%. This result is directly related to the total number of bees in the apiary, which shows that dense colonies prevent the parasite from overgrowth.
